document_data.name: Drashk
document_data.mainbody: '''Captain Drashk''' was a sea-captain in [[Waterdeep]] sometime after the [[War of the Silver Marches]].
document_data.Activities: Drashk was a member of the [[Zhentarim]] who sometimes acted as captain of the ''[[Lost Cause]]''. He had an [[imp]] as advisor.
document_data.History: In the late 1480s or early 1490s [[DR]], the Zhentarim ordered Drashk to travel in search of the [[morkoth (ship)|''Morkoth'']].
